metadata.title: CVE-2021-40568 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Gpac through 1.0.1 via amalformed MP4 file in the svc_parse_slice function in av_parsers.c, whichallows attackers to cause a denial of service, even code execution andescalation of privileges.

criterions.comment: gpac package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
